title: Congenital Hypothyroidism Management System Design and Development

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Simulating the design process of a web-based patient management system based on the ADDIE model in a hands-on environment, including user experience evaluation and database structure design

learning_goals: Learners can design a basic architecture for a congenital hypothyroidism management system following the five phases of the ADDIE model (Analysis, Design, Development, Implementation, Evaluation).
Learners can configure patient information tables (10) and role-based access permissions using a relational database (based on MS SQL Server).
Learners can develop a protocol to analyze system usability by applying user experience (UX) evaluation metrics.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
